name: Porter Bancorp, Inc.
description: Porter Bancorp, Inc. is a financial holding company headquartered in the United States, primarily engaged in the business of providing a wide range of banking services through its subsidiary, PBI Bank. Established in 1999, Porter Bancorp focuses on serving the financial needs of individuals, businesses, and communities in the regions it operates. The bank offers a variety of products including personal and business checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. With a commitment to customer service and community engagement, Porter Bancorp strives to build lasting relationships with its clients while fostering economic growth in its service areas. The company emphasizes a community banking model, which means it is dedicated to understanding and addressing the unique needs of its local customer base. Porter Bancorp also emphasizes technology and innovation in banking, providing online banking services and mobile banking applications to enhance customer convenience. In addition to traditional banking, the company is involved in community development initiatives, supporting local businesses and charitable organizations. As a publicly traded company, Porter Bancorp is committed to transparency and strong corporate governance practices to ensure the interests of its shareholders are well represented.

seo.meta_title: Porter Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Porter Bancorp, Inc., a community-focused financial institution offering a wide range of banking and investment services. Learn about our commitment to customer service and local development.

faq.question: What services does Porter Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Porter Bancorp offers a variety of banking services including checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Porter Bancorp?
faq.answer: John D. Hays is the CEO of Porter Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Porter Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Porter Bancorp is headquartered in Frankfort, Kentucky, USA.
